meanings.definition: The poorest and most crowded urban areas in Brazil.
meanings.sent1: Tourists were warned to avoid the favelas for safety reasons.
meanings.sent2: Living conditions in the favelas were challenging for many residents.
meanings.sent3: Despite their reputation, some favelas had a vibrant street art scene.
meanings.sent4: The favelas stood as a stark reminder of social inequality.
meanings.sent5: The favelas bustled with activity, yet silence echoed through the narrow alleys.
